resources.string: Accès à la raçine refusé. Merci d'autoriser l'accès à la raçine.
L\'architecture de votre CPU n\'est pas supportée
Voulez vous vraiment supprimer toutes les modifications applications par cette application à la base de donnée de l\'application téléphone?
Forcer l\'activation / la désactivation de l\'enregistrement des appels
Mettre sous silence les alertes d\'enregistrement des appels

Il semblerait que le téléphone de Google n'est pas installé. Installer la dernière version bêta depuis le magasin Google play store et essayez à nouveau. Si cette erreur survient à nouveau, veuillez ouvrir une nouvelle requête sur Github.
Phenotype DB does not appear to exist.\n\nIf you have already installed Google Play Services but this error keeps appearing, please open an issue on Github.
If you think you\'ve found any bugs please open an issue on Github

GoogleDialerMod is an app that allows, using root privileges, to modify the values contained in the Google Play Services "Phenotype" database, thus altering the behavior of the Google Dialer app to unlock experimental or blocked features in some countries.\n\nAlways make sure you are using the latest Dialer beta version available on the Play Store, to take advantage of the latest features.

The patches applied by GoogleDialerMod resist Google Dialer updates over time, even after uninstalling the app.
Mods are therefore to be considered permanent, but they can be easily reverted by pressing the trash can icon in the top right menu.
There is no need to keep this app installed after applying the desired changes.

After applying changes, you may need to forcibly reopen and close the Dialer app a couple of times before they take effect.
A new version of GoogleDialerMod is available.\n\nYou can download it from Github\'s Releases page.
